results.title: Effects of dietary cholesterol and simvastatin on cholesterol synthesis in Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome.
results.text_hl: Both high-@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ diets given to ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Cholesterol_pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535937 @@@cholesterol deficiency@@@ while decreasing @CHEMICAL_7_dehydrocholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C016705 @@@7-DHC@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-enriched diets plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to further decrease @CHEMICAL_Sterols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013261 @@@sterol@@@ synthesis have been used as potential therapies.

citations.NLM: Chan YM, Merkens LS, Connor WE, Roullet JB, Penfield JA, Jordan JM, Steiner RD, Jones PJ. Effects of dietary cholesterol and simvastatin on cholesterol synthesis in Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome. Pediatr Res. 2009 Jun;65(6):681-5. PMID: 19430384
